[[Image:Mistwood.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Mistwood on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Mistwood''' is a castle in [[the Stormlands]], the region controlled by [[House Baratheon]] of [[Storm's End]]. The castle is located in a wooded area south of Storm's End.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/storms-end/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Storm's End entry]</ref>
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Mistwood is the seat of House Mertyns. Their only claim to fame is that they once produced a famous member of the [[Kingsguard]], Ser Michael Mertyns, the White Owl.

Mistwood is located on Cape Wrath, in the Rainwood. It is located inland from the [[Sea of Dorne]].
